changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.learn_skill') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.learn_skill GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.learn_skill @account_id dbo.id_t, @character_id dbo.id_t, @current_skill_code dbo.code_t, @learn_skill_code dbo.code_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
IF @current_skill_code != 0 BEGIN UPDATE dbo.Skills SET skill_code = @learn_skill_code WHERE character_id = @character_id AND skill_code = @current_skill_code END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO dbo.Skills(account_id, character_id, skill_code) VALUES(@account_id, @character_id, @learn_skill_code) END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
